title: In case of uses of Data Centre, Data ware houses, the requirements of the parking to the extent of 50% as stated in this regulation shall be permissible
clause_text: In case of uses of Data Centre, Data ware houses, the requirements of the parking to the extent of 50% as stated in this regulation shall be permissible. However, in future if change of user/activity is sought in such case then provision of parking requirement as per this regulation will have to be provided.
